title: Default Mode Revealed

panel_structure.description: The Architect holding a small coffee cup, steam rising and forming various consciousness-altering symbols—mushrooms, meditation poses, sleepless eyes, trauma cracks, coffee beans
The coffee surface acts as a mirror showing reality's default settings like a control panel—sliders and switches revealing the constructed nature of normal perception
Wide shot showing the Architect surrounded by multiple versions of reality, each slightly different based on consciousness state—all equally valid, none truly 'default'

transformation_notes: A simple coffee break becomes a profound meditation on how various altered states—from the dramatic to the mundane—reveal that our 'normal' consciousness is just one arbitrary setting among many.
